items.title: Prime Day is over, but the PS5/Switch game deals aren’t: Donkey Kong Bananza, Mario, Spider-Man 2, more
items.summary:
While the official Amazon Prime Day sale is now over, that doesn’t mean all the game deals are gone. Alongside the updated list of discounts you’ll find below, the official Walmart fall sale remains live through this weekend and it has a ton of notable discounts on PS5 and Switch games right now – you can browse through all of them right here. We will leave you with some highlights below:

  • Donkey Kong Bananza $65.50 (Reg. $70)
  • Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition$15 (Reg. $20)
  • New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe $37 (Reg. $60)
  • Sonic X Shadow Generations $35 (Reg. $60)
  • Super Mario RPG $38 (Reg. $60)
  • Mario & Luigi: Brothership$36 (Reg. $60)
  • Mario Vs. Donkey Kong$40 (Reg. $60)
  • The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD$40 (Reg. $60)
  • And even more…
more…

items.title: Intel says 18A-based Panther Lake chips can deliver 50% more performance at similar power to Lunar Lake chips, details RibbonFET efficiency gains, and more (Jeffrey Kampman/Tom's Hardware)
items.summary:
Jeffrey Kampman / Tom's Hardware:
Intel says 18A-based Panther Lake chips can deliver 50% more performance at similar power to Lunar Lake chips, details RibbonFET efficiency gains, and more  —  Panther Lake brings the power efficiency and graphics performance of Lunar Lake and the platform flexibility of Arrow Lake all together on one SoC

Michael Acton / Financial Times:
Inside Intel's new 700-acre factories in the Arizona desert, which cost $32B and are starting large-scale 18A chip production, as it seeks to impress customers  —  Claims of a breakthrough at the chips company's new Arizona facility will be tested by sceptical Big Tech customers

Intel unveils Panther Lake, or Intel Core Ultra Series 3, the first chip built on its 18A process, coming to laptops and handhelds in late 2025 and early 2026  —  What we know about the next Intel Core Ultra. … Panther Lake is the most important chip Intel has made in years.

items.title: GoPro’s HERO13 Black Ultra-Wide Edition with 177-degree FOV lens mod back to $330 low
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find GoPro’s HERO13 Black Ultra Wide lens bundle going for $329.99 shipped. This bundle debuted a few months after the camera’s original launch carrying a $480 price tag, and it comes with a pre-installed Ultra Wide lens mod right out of the box. Today’s deal shaves $150 off its usual going rate to land it back at the lowest price we first tracked for it in August. This discounted bundle delivers serious value at the discounted price today as the HERO13 Black action camera itself is fetching $360 right now without the lens mod. Head below for more details.

more…

Now, it’s launching an even bigger version, the Prompter XL, that’s targeted at studio use, podcast rooms, and corporate AV setups for $599.99. The Prompter XL has a 15.6-inch LCD display (1920 x 1080), up from the 9-inch […]

items.title: Heads up: You can secure the most affordable M4 iPad Pro at its best price right now on Amazon
items.summary:
Particularly notable deals on the most affordable M4 iPad Pro are generally quite rare. We do see the 256GB 11-inch model at $100 off on a regular basis, but anything more than that is nearly unheard of. However, Amazon now has this model listed at $799.99 shipped – it is temporarily out of stock but you can lock in the best price we have tracked right now at $199 off.

more…

items.title: New models are inbound, but Best Buy is offering $800 off M3 Pro MacBook Pro models right now
items.summary:
Amazon’s Prime Day M4 MacBook Air deals are live and quite notable at up to $230 off the list prices, the M4 MacBook though…not so much. You can land a solid discount on the base model M4 MBP, but after seeing solid $300 discounts for a couple months and reports suggesting stock is dwindling at Apple stores, options are thin right now. That said, if you’re looking to land a huge deal on a MacBook Pro and don’t mind a previous-gen version, Best Buy is offering up to $800 off the original list prices right now on select M3 Pro configs as part of its Techtober sale.  

more…

items.title: Insta360’s latest Flow 2 Pro smartphone gimbal with Apple DockKit subject-tracking, gesture control hits $127 low
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Insta360’s official storefront offering its latest Flow 2 Pro smartphone gimbal standard bundle for $126.99 shipped. This particular model hit the scene earlier this year in January carrying a $160 price tag. It dropped to the $136 mark for the first time a few months back, and its current fall Prime Day offer takes 21% off its usual going rate. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this gimbal, and it’s now fetching $9 less than its previous low and our mention from July. Both black and white variants of this gimbal have hit the $127 low today, and you’ll find its Creator bundle with some neat extras fetching $132.99 shipped instead of its usual $190 price. Head below for more details.

more…

items.summary:
We caught some notable deals in the form of new all-time lows on the brand new Beats iPhone 17 and iPhone Air cases for Prime Day, but some of the prices just dropped even lower this morning. While some models have jumped back up, or are slightly higher than they were, models like the Beats iPhone 17 Pro Max Kickstand Case with MagSafe and Camera Control are now starting down at new $44 all-time lows. Details below.

items.title: Fall Prime Day price still live on Hyperkin’s Xbox 360-style wired gamepad for PC, Series X|S down at $29 (Save 42%)
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that gets you Hyperkin’s Xbox 360-style Xenon wired controller in white for Series X|S and PC for $21.29 Prime shipped. Folks without a Prime membership can dodge the shipping fee by checking out with items worth over $35 in the cart. This is regularly a $50 gamepad, which is now seeing a 42% discount. This fall Prime Day discount shaves $21 off its usual going rate, landing it $2.50 below its previous all-time low. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this model, so be sure to snag it before it jumps back to its full price. You can get this in a handful of other colors, and they’re all discounted at the moment, albeit with relatively lighter deals. Head below for more details.

more…

Some of the Prime Day AirPods deals are still live, but they are starting to disappear. If you missed out yesterday, the base model AirPods 4 low is gone but you can still score AirPods 4 with ANC down at $119 and the particularly notable AirPods Max (USB-C) deal at $429 on all five colors is still live (for now anyway – these deals could be gone at any second).

items.title: Lexar’s 1TB Switch 2-compatible 900MB/s PLAY PRO Express microSD card just hit a new all-time low at $158
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Lexar’s 1TB Switch-2 compatible PLAY PRO Express microSD card currently going for $157.99 shipped. This is regularly a $220 unit that dipped to $187 yesterday as part of the fall Prime Day sale. Today’s deal, however, shaves an additional $29 off that price, marking a new best price to beat. The 512GB variant is also down to $88.47 shipped, which is the lowest we have seen it drop from its usual price of $120. Head below for more details.

items.title: The Meta Ray-Ban Display’s most interesting tech might be the glass
